title: Chocolate
brief_description: Shows people, including Woody Allen, Jonathon Winters and Jo Ann Worley, tasting a cocoa bean and trying to guess what it was. The film depicts, without narration, the manufacture of chcolate from the extraction of the nuts from the cocoa buds to the addition of sugar to the chocolate powder.
